attributes.title: You’re kidding me right
attributes.review: I just can’t pretend anymore I’m just sick of this app, I really wanted the pet turtle they were going to send to my house if I downloaded this app. So disappointed ✨ew✨

attributes.title: this one really ain’t it sis 🥰🧚🏻‍♀️💓
attributes.review: so we really were about to let a cheeto take tik tok from us, when really the app that should be banned is THIS ONE. just know gen z is always gonna come back to get ya sweetie, xoxo ❤️❤️❤️❤️

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: The app is ridiculously slow, and it keeps crashing. A waste of time, don’t bother. Wish I could give it a 0.

attributes.title: yeah ❤️
attributes.review:
after a few days of using this app. i noticed that it was glitching alottt. and i think that 😻cheeto😻 man needs to step up his app game. you would think as the president he could do alot better. anyways after i stopped using this app 😻 cheeto dust 😻 started to appear in my dreams.. i didnt like him in my dreams so i would wake up crying. i hate this app deleting it. 
-sincerely gen z 😌🙈😹😻

attributes.title: Rat .
attributes.review: Why would you make kids go through these things ? Your putting us through all of this ! You need to be treated like us !!

attributes.title: This app called me ugly
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app and less than two minutes in it spat in my face and called me ugly!!! Would definitely not recommend and honestly I demand an apology.

attributes.title: Jsnsbsnajns
attributes.review: My grandma got his app and after three months it finally downloaded and then when she open the app turn Dragon she came out of her phone and ate her dog in her fridge

attributes.title: STOP
attributes.review: After I texted them to stop sending me messages they never stopped until I spammed them to stop. By law, you have to stop giving me messages. Bad app.

attributes.title: such a terrible format
attributes.review: although this app looks like it would be nice and we’ll run, it was truly awful. everything glitches and it even got to the point where it was starting to make my phone glitch even when the app was closed. the experience was so bad i would give it 0 stars if i could.

attributes.title: Gen z is to strong for u ✌🏼😂
attributes.review: This app is just hurts my head this Cheeto head looking guy showed up on my screen He looks and probably is the most racist guy I’ve ever seen smh if he don’t get a life 😌✌🏼
